document_data.name: Mtu Barua
document_data.mainbody:
'''Mtu Barua''' was a seneschal in the service of [[Ifan Talro'a]], a [[Port Nyanzaru#Merchant Princes|merchant prince]] of [[Port Nyanzaru]] in [[Chult]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{Quote|This is Port Nyanzaru, gateway to Chult. Are you lost, stranger?|Mtu Barua}}
document_data.Activities: He often made trips to Port Nyanzaru's [[Red Bazaar|Bazaar]] to run errands for his master.
